document_data.name: Laeral's Gesture
document_data.mainbody: '''''Laeral's gesture''''' was an [[alteration]] [[wizard]] [[spell]] developed by [[Laeral Silverhand]].
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster to cast a previously memorized medium- to lower-power spell by performing a complex physical gesture. It was quite useful if a wizard found themselves without their spell components.
document_data.Components: This spell only required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components to cast.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Laeral created this spell after she was attacked while bathing and not in the vicinity of her spell components.
